description: The Licence Holder shall construct, operate and maintain the <<impounding works/hydropower scheme/intake works>> in accordance with the specifications and <<plans/drawings>>: <<reference(s) including title and revision number as appropriate>> dated <<date>>, <<a copy/copies>> of which are appended to this licence, or such minor amendments to <<that/those>> document<<s>> that are accepted in writing by the Agency prior to the date of commencement of construction.
